page.title: 16HORNDEAN X OIL WELL
page.content: The{oil well} is in a field belonging to {Pyle Farm}to the south of the Rowland's Castle Road. They received Planning Permission in October 1982 and started work in November. The actual drilling began in December and oil was struck in January 1983 at about 5000 ft. A nodding donkey was installed in February. Production is expected to last for about 10-15 yrs. Further investigation and testing is still going on. Three new appraisal wells have been drilled, one of which is near Dell Piece and called{Horndean {B.}Banks and trees screen and reduce most of the noise of the well. In the field they have a pump and storage tanks. They have also made an access road. One corner has been realigned to ease cultivation. The outer sides of the bank have been planted with native deciduous shrubs and trees.
